00024 
00025 //: Cross product of two 2-vectors
00026 //  \relatesalso vnl_vector_fixed
00027 inline
00028 float vnl_cross_2d(vnl_float_2 const& v1, vnl_float_2 const& v2)
00029 {
00030   return v1[0] * v2[1] - v1[1] * v2[0];
00031 }
